content.text:
# Pamela Duncan Edwards

}}
Pamela Duncan Edwards is a British born children's author who now lives in the US. She has published over forty picture books for children, both in America and Britain.
External links
* [http://www.pameladuncanedwards.net Official website]
* [http://www.readingrockets.org/books/interviews/edwards/featuredbooks Booklist]
* [http://www.readingrockets.org/books/interviews/edwards/ Video interview with Pamela Duncan Edwards]
